name: lymphoma
description: A hematologic cancer that affects lymphocytes that reside in the lymphatic system and in blood-forming organs.

name: myeloid neoplasm
description: A bone marrow cancer that is formed of any one of the bone marrow cells belonging to the granulocytic (neutrophil, eosinophil, basophil), monocytic/macrophage, erythroid, megakaryocytic and mast cell lineages.

name: prostate carcinoma
description: A prostate cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells.

name: esophageal carcinoma
description: A esophageal cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells.
synonyms: ["cancer of esophagus","cancer of oesophagus","carcinoma OF ESOPHAGUS","carcinoma of esophagus","carcinoma of oesophagus"]

name: leukemia
description: A cancer that affects the blood or bone marrow characterized by an abnormal proliferation of blood cells.

name: lung cancer
description: A respiratory system cancer that is located_in the lung.

name: colon carcinoma
description: A colon cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells.

name: melanoma
description: A cell type cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from melanocytes which are found in skin, the bowel and the eye.

name: prostate adenocarcinoma
description: A prostate carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

name: granulosa cell tumor
description: A sex cord-gonadal stromal tumor that has_material_basis_in granulosa cells and arises from the sex cord stroma.
synonyms: ["Granulosa cell neoplasm","Granulosa cell tumor, adult type","Granulosa cell tumour, sarcomatoid","malignant granulosa cell neoplasm"]

name: carcinoma
description: A cell type cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells.

name: glioblastoma
description: A malignant astrocytoma characterized by the presence of small areas of necrotizing tissue that is surrounded by anaplastic cells as well as the presence of hyperplastic blood vessels, and that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from multiple cell types including astrocytes and oligondroctyes.
synonyms: ["adult glioblastoma multiforme","GBM","glioblastoma multiforme","grade IV adult Astrocytic tumor","primary glioblastoma multiforme","spongioblastoma multiforme"]

name: malignant astrocytoma
description: A malignant glioma that is has_material_basis_in astrocyte cells, a type of star-shaped glial cell, located in the brain and spinal cord.
synonyms: ["Astrocytic tumor","astrocytoma of brain","astrocytoma of Cerebrum","astroglioma","cerebral astrocytoma"]

name: rhabdomyosarcoma
description: A skeletal muscle cancer that arise from skeletal muscle progenitors.

name: osteosarcoma
description: A bone sarcoma that is located_in bone that has_material_basis_in cells of mesenchymal origin.

name: breast carcinoma
description: A breast cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells.

name: ovarian cystadenocarcinoma
description: An ovary adenocarcinoma that is characterized by the presence of cysts or cystic spaces.

name: uterine cancer
description: A female reproductive organ cancer that is located_in the uterus.
synonyms: ["CA - cancer of uterus","malignant neoplasm of uterus","malignant uterine tumor","neoplasm of uterus","Tumour of uterus","uterine tumor","uterus neoplasm"]

name: cervical adenocarcinoma
description: A cervix carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.
synonyms: ["adenocarcinoma cervix uteri","adenocarcinoma of cervix","adenocarcinoma of the uterine Cervix"]

name: ovary adenocarcinoma
description: An ovarian carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

name: gastric adenocarcinoma
description: A stomach carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

name: ovarian carcinoma
description: An ovarian cancer that has_material_basis_in epithelial tissue and is located_in the ovary.

name: bladder urothelial carcinoma
description: A bladder carcinoma that has_material_basis_in transitional cells located_in the lining of the bladder.
synonyms: ["bladder transitional cell carcinoma","transitional cell carcinoma of bladder","urinary bladder urothelial carcinoma","urothelial bladder carcinoma"]

name: bladder carcinoma
description: A urinary bladder cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives_from epithelial cells.

name: pancreatic adenocarcinoma
description: A pancreatic carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

name: hepatocellular carcinoma
description: A liver carcinoma that has_material_basis_in undifferentiated hepatocytes and located_in the liver.

name: neuroblastoma
description: An autonomic nervous system neoplasm that derives_from immature nerve cells.

name: chronic myeloid leukemia
description: A myeloid leukemia that is characterized by over production of white blood cells.
synonyms: ["chronic granulocytic leukaemia","chronic granulocytic leukemia","chronic myelogenous leukaemia","chronic myelogenous leukemia","chronic myeloid leukaemia","CML","CML - chronic Myelogenous Leukemia","Myeloid Leukemia, chronic"]
